item.title: Two Very small problems
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

Solved.

#1 - I just wanted to add Taverly to the dragonstone amulet teleport… For some reason, the client and server compile and run just fine, but when I rub the amulet, the “Taverly” option does not appear.

[code] switch (option) {
case 0: // Edgeville
owner.teleport(225, 445, true);
break;
case 1: // Karamja
owner.teleport(360, 696, true);
break;
case 2: // Draynor Village
owner.teleport(214, 632, true);
break;
case 3: // Al Kharid
owner.teleport(72, 696, true);
break;
case 4: // Seers
owner.teleport(516, 460, true);
break;
case 5: // Yanille
owner.teleport(587, 761, true);
break;
case 6: // Taverly
owner.teleport(364, 488, true);
break;
default:
return;

			}[/code]

Any ideas?

#2 - I’m having a small problem getting my compress tool to do it’s job.

Read full topic
